description: This file is a CMake script designed to locate and configure the Aamp streamer library within a build system. It attempts to find the necessary headers and library files for the Aamp component and sets up the relevant CMake variables and targets for integration.

methods.name: find_path
methods.description: Locates the header file 'priv_aamp.h' in specified directories.

methods.name: include
methods.description: Includes other CMake scripts, here used to import standard functions.

methods.name: find_package_handle_standard_args
methods.description: Handles the standard process of checking the presence of required package components.

methods.name: set_target_properties
methods.description: Sets properties for the imported AAMP library target.

methods.name: add_library
methods.description: Creates an imported library target 'AAMP::AAMP' for linking.
